sentences.text: Poland succeeded Hungary as president on <abbr>1 January</abbr> 2025. The next presidency will be held by Denmark starting on <abbr>1 July</abbr> 2025.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |date=26 July 2016 |title=Council Decision (EU) 2016/1316 of 26 July 2016 |url=https://www.consilium.europa.eu/media/56627/presidencies-until-2030.pdf |access-date=9 July 2024 |website=Official Journal of the European Union}}</ref>

sentences.text: The slogan of the 2025 Polish Presidency is "Security, Europe." The objectives stated on its presidency website focus on the following priorities:

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |title=Priorities of the Polish presidency |url=https://polish-presidency.consilium.europa.eu/en/programme/priorities/ |access-date=9 July 2024 |website=Polish Presidency}}</ref>
